sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Electric Vehicle Charging Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Electric Vehicle Charging Act.

sections.heading: Legislative intent. Electric vehicles are an important tool to fight the climate crisis, tackle air pollution, and provide safe, clean, and affordable personal transportation

sections.heading: EV-capable parking space requirement
sections.text: A new single-family residence or a small multifamily residence shall have at least one EV-capable parking space for each residential unit that has dedicated parking, unless any subsequently adopted building code requires additional EV-capable parking spaces, EV-
